name: Sky Crystals
description:
Sky Crystals

A first person platformer where you collect crystals in a world made of islands floating in the sky.

Story:

You wake up in a strange world where everything is floating in the sky.
There are mysterious glowing crystals hidden in various places, collect all 5 of them!

Features:
  • Retro 3D graphics with low resolution textures.
  • One level with 5 hidden crystals.
  • A Timer that starts once you leave the first platform.
  • Saves your best time!
Controls:
  • Mouse: look around
  • WASD: walk
  • Shift: hold to run
  • Space: jump
  • Escape: toggle pause
  • F11 or Alt+Enter: toggle fullscreen
  • F10: toggle HUD

Press F12 when paused to go back to the title screen.
Escape at the title screen to quit.

Notes:

In case of perfomance issues with the html5 version, try the downloadable version for your operating system.

The Linux version is untested.
